remarks: The sequence of partial finite sums of a converging infinite series converge to the infinite sum of the series.  Note that ` j ` must not occur in ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jan-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isumclim3.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumclim3.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isumclim3.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. dom ~~> ) $.
isumclim3.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
isumclim3.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. Z ) -> ( F ` j ) = sum_ k e. ( M ... j ) A ) $.
isumclim3 $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> sum_ k e. Z A ) $.
$d A j $.
$d F j $.
$d M j k $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j k ph $.
